channel.title: Web client problem
channel.description: hello, im using a server thats compatible with pwnscape v3 client. however i followed a guide to make a web client. Im was having some problems. firstly the ip address the jar is connecting to is always localhost even though in the gui.java its the correct one. secondly alot of buttons were missing in the jar version (like music, emotes buttons etc). Can anyone help me? is there like a guide for this type of server specifically or something? Is there another client that works with the pwnscape v3 server? ty

item.title: Web client problem
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

what? im using the downloadble client, but i want to make a web client, it will look nice on my website

Read full topic

item.title: Web client problem
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Yeah, people have been complaining about bluurrs client base not being able to have music and stuff in it…
Just do a downloadable client dude…
Alot easier
